excerpt: Curious to know the HBO Max schedule from December 23-29 2024? Here are all the movies & TV shows being added to the platform this week.

text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 23-29 2024 include Alien Files: Reopened Season 1, Building Outside the Lines Season 2, In with the Old Season 7, and The Flipping El Moussas Season 2. On December 23, Alien Files: Reopened Season 1 drops on HBO Max. The series features experts who delve deep into one of the world’s biggest mysteries – UFOs and aliens. While theories and clues are endless, tracking down mysterious creatures is not an easy job. Further, Building Outside the Lines Season 2 will be available on the streaming platform on December 27, 2024. It showcases the team of father-daughter duo of designer and builder Jared Capp and his talented daughter, Alex. Together, they give a never-seen-before transformation to pre-existing structures. However, this fantasizing journey requires a lot of hard work and patience. Also coming out on HBO Max is another reality show In with the Old Season 7. It features builders, designers, and old-home enthusiasts giving a magical renovation to abandoned buildings. Whether it’s a shingle-style home or a tobacco plantation, nothing seems impossible for these creators. Additionally, The Flipping El Moussas Season 2 releases on the platform this week. It follows the personal and professional lives of the power couple Tarek El Moussa and Rae El Moussa. They try their best to fulfill their goals as property experts. html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for December 23-29 2024 include Alien Files: Reopened Season 1, Building Outside the Lines Season 2, In with the Old Season 7, and The Flipping El Moussas Season 2.

On December 23, Alien Files: Reopened Season 1 drops on HBO Max. The series features experts who delve deep into one of the world’s biggest mysteries – UFOs and aliens. While theories and clues are endless, tracking down mysterious creatures is not an easy job.

Further, Building Outside the Lines Season 2 will be available on the streaming platform on December 27, 2024. It showcases the team of father-daughter duo of designer and builder Jared Capp and his talented daughter, Alex. Together, they give a never-seen-before transformation to pre-existing structures. However, this fantasizing journey requires a lot of hard work and patience.

Also coming out on HBO Max is another reality show In with the Old Season 7. It features builders, designers, and old-home enthusiasts giving a magical renovation to abandoned buildings. Whether it’s a shingle-style home or a tobacco plantation, nothing seems impossible for these creators.

Additionally, The Flipping El Moussas Season 2 releases on the platform this week. It follows the personal and professional lives of the power couple Tarek El Moussa and Rae El Moussa. They try their best to fulfill their goals as property experts.

New HBO Max releases for December 23-29 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from December 23-29 2024

December 23

  • Alien Files: Reopened Season 1

December 27

  • In with the Old Season 7 (Magnolia Network)
  • The Flipping El Moussas Season 2 (HGTV)
  • Building Outside the Lines Season 2 (Magnolia Network)

December 28

  • Mecum Full Throttle: Kansas City MO 2024
  • Evolve and Flex Episode 4

For more HBO Max content, check out the trailer of The White Lotus Season 3. Also, here is everything you need to know about TCM Hub expansion at Max.
